attributes.action: Make Alan Bates a member of the House of Lords
attributes.additional_details: He has never given up and selflessly worked for the good of other people.
attributes.background: Alan Bates is an example of selfless commitment to ensuring fair play for ordinary people.

rejection.details:
We can't accept petitions about honours or appointments. This includes requests for peerages.

You can find out how people are appointed to the House of Lords here: https://www.parliament.uk/about/mps-and-lords/about-lords/lords-appointment/
